backend/main.mo: Main actor defining data models, access control, and user profile CRUD with supporting maps for ledger, travellers, incomes, and entries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old traveller records to new schema by renaming 'name' to 'pseudo' and returning updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React app with main.tsx and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, profile setup modal, and rendering the ledger page with theming and toasts.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing branding, sync status, and logout controls with local storage and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard that shows a login screen until the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable UI component displaying an icon or illustration with title, description, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time profile creation allowing users to enter and save their name with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Wrapper adding horizontal scroll and border styling around table content.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Displays sync status with icons, text, and relative last-sync time.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: Provides UI to export ledger backups, import backups, and handle merge/restore confirmations.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Manages car expense entry, auto-toll settings, and calculates totals for the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Dialog form for recording cash payments for a traveller with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Password‑protected panel to clear various ledger data categories with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CoTraveller: Dialog to add or edit income records from co‑travellers with validation and date selection.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Renders a table for marking traveller AM/PM trip participation by date with bulk toggles, weekend inclusion settings, and save actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: UI control for selecting start and end dates using popover calendars tied to ledger state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense and showing a success toast.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a traveller’s cash payment with a success toast.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteTripH: Confirmation dialog for deleting a trip history entry, optionally clearing traveller trips for that date.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Dialog for editing a car expense with fields for date, category, amount, and note, including validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog for editing a cash payment’s amount, date, and note with validation and update handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditTripHis: Dialog for editing a traveller’s morning/evening trip participation for a specific date.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Dialog wrapper displaying the expense history view with scrolling support.
Displays, filters, searches, sorts, edits, and deletes car expenses within a selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Renders an export button that opens the report export dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Provides a dialog for exporting ledger data with format, report type, and filter options, triggering CSV or PDF generation.
Main ledger page managing tabs, dialogs, sidebar actions, and syncing while rendering all ledger panels.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Context provider exposing ledger state and actions sourced from useLedgerLocalState.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MobileLedge: Mobile sidebar navigation listing ledger tabs and quick actions like payment history, expense history, and export.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form for adding other pending amounts to a traveller with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Computes total income, expenses, profit/loss, and monthly breakdowns from daily data and renders an overall financial summary UI.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Wraps the payment history view inside a dialog with header and scrollable content.
Displays a filterable, sortable table of cash payments with edit/delete actions and traveller-based filtering.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentSumm: Calculates per‑traveller total charges, payments, dues, and overall totals, and renders a payment summary table.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Provides an input control to view and update the per‑trip rate with validation and formatting.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Generates per‑traveller trip counts, charges, payments, pending amounts, and balances, and displays detailed summaries with forms for adding payments.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: Manages traveller list creation, renaming, and deletion with balance checks to prevent removing travellers who have outstanding dues.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripHistory: Builds and displays a sorted list of traveller and co‑traveller trip entries with edit/delete dialogs and totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Handles periodic syncing and merging of local ledger state with remote app data using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoTollSettings.t: Manages persisted auto‑toll settings with localStorage-backed state and simple setters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and managing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Maintains and persists all local ledger state including travellers, trips, payments, expenses, and settings with merge helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react‑query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and improved table readability.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
Generates monthly, profit/loss, income, and expense statements from ledger data by aggregating trips, co‑traveller income, and car expenses. Core logic computes month‑wise income and expenses based on date filtering and trip counts.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Provides JSON backup/export and file‑based restore of ledger state, including validation and merging of local and remote states. Handles traveller merging and OR‑based trip data merging.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Utility functions for generating date ranges, formatting dates, and extracting weekdays within a range. Includes helpers for current week Monday–Friday selection.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Generates CSV‑structured data for Excel export, including a daily AM/PM trip grid and per‑traveller trip/payment summary. Handles weekend rules, payments filtering, and download initiation.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Builds HTML‑based PDF reports including standard, monthly, profit/loss, income, and expense formats. Integrates ledger calculations, date filtering, and styling for PDF output.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Exports ledger data to CSV with options for daily grid, traveller summaries, payments, and expenses, using filters to customize output. Also routes PDF export requests to the PDF generator.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Calculates per‑traveller balance by counting trips, computing charges, and subtracting payments within a date range. Supports weekend inclusion rules and optional pending adjustments.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides helpers to format INR currency and parse currency strings into numeric values.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Computes total and monthly income from trip data, considering weekend inclusion rules and co‑traveller income.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash routing compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines whether dates, including weekends with saved data, should be included or editable in calculations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s requirements and state for enhancing export reports and financial statements without affecting DataSync.
